input.sentences: we were at a birthday party with cake !
people were being silly and holding up masks to their faces .
they were giving out zebra plushes as party favors because it was her favorite animal .
they handed out balloons as well .
output.sentences: The elaborate birthday cake was a work of art.
The children donned masks of their favorite celebrities.
Plush toys were given out as party favors.
Cutting the beautiful cake took a little planning.
